function.name: transfer_to_human
function.description: Transfers the call to a human handler. Use this for emergency situations, unaccompanied minors, detained persons, interpreter needs, or when the customer explicitly requests to speak with a person.

reason.description: Reason for transfer: danger, detained, minor, interpreter, court_hearing, customer_request, complex_case

urgency.description: Urgency level: immediate (danger/detained/minor), high (court hearing soon), normal (other)

details.description: Brief details about the situation to help the human handler
